arts.ttl: Ligue 1 round-up as promising teenager opens PSG account
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain returned to the summit of Ligue 1 on Saturday as they saw off Strasbourg with a 4-2 victory at home. 18-year-old midfielder Senny Mayulu opened the scoring with the first league goal of his fledgling career, before Marco Asensio doubled their lead just after the break. Seko Marou got one back for the […] The post Ligue 1 round-up as promising teenager opens PSG account first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Julien Stéphan’s Rennes future in doubt ahead of must-win derby
arts.sum: According to a report by Foot Mercato, Julien Stéphan’s future as Stade Rennais manager hangs in the balance ahead of this afternoon’s Derby de la Bretagne against Stade Brestois. Rennes…

arts.ttl: Brest predicted XI vs Rennes: Pierre Lees-Melou set for first start of season
arts.sum: Pierre Lees-Melou could make his first start of the season against local rivals Stade Rennais. Lees Melou has been out of the squad after he underwent season-ending surgery on a…
